full_text:

title:
We have received and answered two of your claims: 1) video of people firing at a cow 2) Vivek Agnihotri's 200 cr donation-related claim.

Apart from these two claims that we have debunked, we have not received any other request from you. If you have any other ting to verify, please send us and follow the commands given by the bot. 
Thanks.
